document_data.caption: A map showing the Bloody Fist on Presper Street.
document_data.name: Bloody Fist
document_data.mainbody: The '''Bloody Fist''' was a [[tavern]] located in [[Waterdeep]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The building stood just one story tall.
document_data.Location: The Bloody Fist was located in Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Dock Ward|Dock Ward]] where [[Presper Street]] and [[Shrimp Alley]] joined [[Snail Street]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Volo 5308a}}
document_data.Activities: A man named [[One-Eyed Jukk]] dealt in stolen goods within the Bloody Fist.
